pages.text: $(li)Feathers are a soft material that can be used to craft Arrows, Book and Quill, Feather Blocks, Charged Arrows, and even even a complete Feather Armor.$(br)$(li)They can be crafted with Feather Blocks and viceversa in a Crafting Table or be found in Loot Chests too.
$(li)Some Mobs, like Bald Eagles, Chickens, Crows, Ducks, Emus, Parrots, Roadrunners, Seagulls, Shoebills and Turkeys may drops Feathers when they are slayed.
